entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 5:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning early this evening then changing to snow later this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
